faq.question: Should I choose Google Ads or Facebook Ads?
faq.answer: It depends on your business. Google Ads works best for high-intent searches (like 'plumber near me'). Facebook Ads works better for awareness and targeting specific demographics. We'll recommend the best fit during your strategy call.

faq.question: Are there any call limits?
faq.answer: No! The Growth Package includes unlimited calls. You can handle as many inbound calls as your business generates with no additional fees.

faq.question: Who pays for the actual ad spend?
faq.answer: The ad spend ($1K-$3K/month) is billed directly from Google or Facebook to your credit card. Our $797/mo fee covers the management, optimization, creative, and AI system.

faq.question: Can I switch between Google and Facebook Ads?
faq.answer: Yes! You can switch platforms once per quarter. Or upgrade to Enterprise to run both simultaneously.

faq.question: How quickly will I see results?
faq.answer: Most clients see qualified leads within the first 7-10 days of ad launch. Full optimization usually takes 30-45 days as we refine targeting and creative.
